dict.string:
Bodyweight Exercise: 60-90 sec rest between sets
1. Birddog Progression 10x on each side - 3 sets 2. Deadbug Progression 10x on each side - 3 sets 3. Push-up Progression 12x - 5 sets 4. Rows (Or Reverse Push-ups) Progression 12x - 5 sets 5. Squat Progression 15x - 3 sets 6. Glute Bridge Progression 15x - 3 sets

Bodyweight Exercise:
1. Brisk five-minute warmup walk
2. Then jog 4km (or 25 minutes).
